description: Here, Rubens presented a distinctly human take on the figures of Jesus, Mary, and Joseph. They lack the halos that often identify them, and the adult characters wear contemporary Flemish attire. Mary’s exposed breast brings to mind Jesus’s need for physical nourishment as the human son of God. Her central placement underscores the growing veneration of Mary in the Catholic community of the Spanish Netherlands.
title: The Holy Family with Saints Elizabeth and John the Baptist
